keywords.value: Disney, Walt, World (Lake Buena Vista, Fla)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By NICK MADIGAN and CHRISTINE HAUSER
byline.contributor: Nick Madigan reported from Lake Buena Vista, and Christine Hauser from New York. Reporting was contributed by Daniel Victor, Lew Serviss and Justin Porter from New York; David Moll from Hong Kong; and Sewell Chan from London.

lead_paragraph: The boy, from Nebraska, was with his family at a lagoon in the Walt Disney World Resort in Florida when he was attacked and dragged away.

headline.print_headline: A Carefree Evening in Florida Ends in a Family’s Heartbreak
headline.main: Divers Find Body of Toddler Snatched by Alligator at Disney Resort

snippet: The boy, from Nebraska, was with his family at a lagoon in the Walt Disney World Resort in Florida when he was attacked and dragged away.
abstract: Divers find remains of Lane Graves, 2-year-old boy who drowned after being snatched by alligator during visit with family to Orlando-area Disney resort; officials say Graves had been splashing around in lagoon at resort before alligator attacked.
